Sentencas: The BaCe0.7Zr0.1Y0.2-xZnxO3-delta (x = 0.05, 0.10, 0.15, 0.20) has been synthesized by the conventional solid state reaction method for application in protonic solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Highly dense and chemically stable proton conducting electrolyte sintered at 1200 °C

Sentencas: The phase purity and lattice parameters of the materials have been studied by the room temperature X-ray diffraction (XRD).
Titulo: Highly dense and chemically stable proton conducting electrolyte sintered at 1200 °C

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy (SEM) has been done for check the morphology and grain growth of the samples.
Titulo: Highly dense and chemically stable proton conducting electrolyte sintered at 1200 °C

Sentencas: The chemical and mechanical stabilities have been done using thermogravimetric analysis (TGA) in pure CO2 environment and thermomechanical analysis (TMA) in Argon atmosphere.
Titulo: Highly dense and chemically stable proton conducting electrolyte sintered at 1200 °C

Sentencas: The XRD of the materials show the orthorhombic crystal symmetry with Pbnm space group.
Titulo: Highly dense and chemically stable proton conducting electrolyte sintered at 1200 °C

Sentencas: The SEM images of the pellets show that the samples sintered at 1200 degrees C are highly dense.
Titulo: Highly dense and chemically stable proton conducting electrolyte sintered at 1200 °C

Sentencas: The XRD after TGA in CO2 and thermal expansion measurements confirm the stability.
Titulo: Highly dense and chemically stable proton conducting electrolyte sintered at 1200 °C

Sentencas: The particles of the samples are in micrometer ranges and increasing Zn content decreases the size.
Titulo: Highly dense and chemically stable proton conducting electrolyte sintered at 1200 °C

Sentencas: The conductivity measurements have been done in 5% H-2 with Ar in dry and wet atmospheres.
Titulo: Highly dense and chemically stable proton conducting electrolyte sintered at 1200 °C

Sentencas: All the materials show high proton conductivity in the intermediate temperature range (400-700 degrees C).
Titulo: Highly dense and chemically stable proton conducting electrolyte sintered at 1200 °C

Sentencas: The maximum proton conductivity was found to be 1.0 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Highly dense and chemically stable proton conducting electrolyte sintered at 1200 °C

Sentencas: S cm(-1) at 700 degrees C in wet atmosphere for x = 0.10.
Titulo: Highly dense and chemically stable proton conducting electrolyte sintered at 1200 °C

Sentencas: From our study, 10 wt % of Zn seems to be optimum at the B -site of the perovskite structure.
Titulo: Highly dense and chemically stable proton conducting electrolyte sintered at 1200 °C

Sentencas: All the properties studied here suggest it can be a promising candidate of electrolyte for IT-SOFCs.
Titulo: Highly dense and chemically stable proton conducting electrolyte sintered at 1200 °C
